subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Gymnastics
Age, Chronological
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: Officials from the International Olympic Committee have asked the international gymnastics federation, known as the F.I.G., to collect evidence of Chinese gymnasts’ ages.
snippet: Officials from the International Olympic Committee have asked the international gymnastics federation, known as the F.I.G., to collect evidence of Chinese gymnasts’ ages.
